name: Garden: Urada Chapter Part 2
description:
Garden: Urada Chapter Part 2 is the second part of a retro sci-fi RPG Garden Urada Chapter Part 1 for Gameboy made with GB Studio featuring a party of three characters assisting a colony on a recently colonized planet.

Part 2 does not support any kind of save data transfer from Part 1. Instead, it begins with characters at a set level and with all the equipment and treasures found in Part 1.

Main features

Turn-based battles with challenging bosses

Character progression (levels, equipment, skills)

A world filled with enemies, treasures, and puzzles

Controls in-game keyboard function A Z interact B X cancel START ENTER open menu SELECT SHIFT open additional menu D-pad arrow keys move, navigate menus Install

Open the Garden Urada Chapter Part 2 v1.0.0.gb with an emulator supporting .gb files (tested with VisualBoyAdvance, My Oldboy!)

Garden Urada Chapter Part 1 & 2.zip contains an executable version of the game that contains everything needed to play. Just extract the files to a location of your choice and open "garden part1.exe" and "garden part2.exe"  to play! 

Or click Run Game at the top of the page to play on the browser.

Project status: released

Known issues:

- Some NPCs or objects do not show. Moving outside of the visible range or opening and closing the menu should make them reappear.
